example.en: Each country has its own cultural norms.

words.definition: The process of adjusting to a new culture.

example.en: Adaptation can be challenging when moving to a new country.
example.ar: يمكن أن يشكّل التكيّف تحديًا عند الانتقال إلى بلد جديد.

example.en: Learning local etiquette is important when traveling.

words.definition: The process of becoming part of a society.

words.arabic_definition: رأي مسبق عن شخص أو مجموعة.

example.en: We must overcome prejudice to build understanding.
example.ar: علينا التغلب على التحيّز لبناء تفاهم.

words.definition: The presence of different cultures and ideas.

example.en: The city is known for its diversity.

example.en: Inclusivity ensures that all voices are heard.

words.definition: The process by which the world becomes more connected.
